DOC.detailed_description: Diabetes mellitus ( DM ) become global epidemic . Its complication significant impact quality life , longevity , cost public health . The World Health Organization ( WHO ) estimate 2040 , 642 million people suffer diabetes , around 10 % world adult population ( WHO , 2015 ) . Periodontal Diseases consider sixth complication DM . This close relationship disease characterize mutual influence . Thus , appropriate control periodontal disease may facilitate DM control , improve quality life diabetic patient . Besides , presence DM might impair prognosis diverse dental treatment due inflammatory nature , negative influence wound healing , bone biology , establishment infection . As host modulatory therapy ( HMT ) , daily supplementation omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid low-dose aspirin propose adjunct therapy treatment chronic periodontitis , show good clinical metabolic result normoglycemic patient . Therefore , aim study investigate effectiveness daily supplementation omega-3 polyunsaturated fatty acid low-dose aspirin adjunct therapy one-stage full-mouth periodontal ultrasonic debridement treatment chronic periodontitis type 2 diabetic patient superiority randomize clinical trial .
